mapper.select: SELECT * FROM combined_events ce WHERE observation_id in ( select observation_id from normalized_records where external_id = #{externalId} order by updated_on)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO combined_events (observation_id, type, name, description, started_on, ended_on) VALUES (#{observationId}, #{type}, #{name}, #{description}, #{startedOn}, #{endedOn})
INSERT INTO combined_episodes (event_id, observation_id, description, occurred_on, loaded_on, provider) VALUES (#{eventId}, #{observationId}, #{description}, #{occurredOn}, #{loadedOn}, #{provider})
INSERT INTO combined_areas (episode_id, severity, geometry) VALUES (#{episodeId}, #{severity}, 'SRID=4326;${geometry}'::geometry)
